content: from * to end round 2 and all even rounds using current color k the k sts and sl the slipped sts as you come to them round 3 using color a *k4 sl1 k1 sl1 k3 repeat from * to end of round round 5 using color b *k1 sl2 k5 sl2 repeat from * to end of round round 7 using color a *k3 sl 1 k1 twice sl1 k2 repeat from * to end of round round 9 using color b *k1 sl1 k7 sl1 repeat from * to end of round round 11 using color a *k2 sl1 k1 4 times repeat from * to end of round round 13 using color b *sl1 k4 repeat from * to end of round round 15 using color a * k1 sl1 twice k3 sl1 k1 sl1 repeat from * to end of round round 17 using color b *k4 s1 k1 sl1 k3 repeat from * to end of round round 19 using color a *sl1 k1 sl1 k5 sl1 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 21 using color b *k3 sl2 k1 sl2 k2 repeat from * to end of round round 23 using color a *k1 sl1 k7 sl1 repeat from * to end of round round 25 using color b *k2 sl2 k1 sl1 k1 sl2 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 27 using color a k to end of round round 28 repeat round 2 repeat rounds 1-28 a total of 2 times then repeat rounds 1-27 once top ribbing rounds 1-12 *k3 p2 repeat from * around bind off in pattern using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off with this bind off be careful not to do it too loosely i try to make it a point to do it a tiny bit tighter than i do other bind offs because it is so stretchy that it can flare when done too loose finishing weave in all ends using tapestry needle soak the item and block to desired dimensions i soaked the item in cool water with wool wash for 15 minutes and then pinned to dimensions listed in finished size on the 1st page of the pattern 2 | slip aw ay cowl / / crazy so ck lady de signs fo r he lp co nt ac t k ay at c razy so c k lady de signs@gm ail c om
